text: The Waterpark Creek is a creek located in Central Queensland, Australia. The headwaters of the creek rise below Samuel Hill in the Great Dividing Range and flows in a south easterly direction. It continues through the Byfield National Park and then travels almost parallel with the Yeppoon - Byfield Road before discharging into Corio Bay, approximately north of Yeppoon, and then into the Coral Sea. The creek descends over its course. The drainage basin of the creek occupies an area of of which an area of is made up of estuarine wetlands. ==See also== *List of rivers of Queensland ==References== Category:Rivers of Queensland Category:Central Queensland Category:Bodies of water of the Coral Sea
title: Waterpark Creek
